content:
It’s 04:43 AM right now and I’m done with the first decent version of this website and I’m happy now.
But I’m still not satisfied, I still have to modify so many things that I couldnt do today so there is that but doing something which makes you lose track of time in a good way is something that I can never get tired of.
Even now, when its 5AM now, I can still do more stuff and go on for a couple more hours but this is enough for today. I have achieved what i planned 12hrs ago so I’m glad that I was able to achieve my target.
That’s all I’m gonna say. GoodBye!
summary: its 5AM now, i need to sleep ASAP
title: Why I'm writing this at 5AM

content:
Hey, I’m silentfin. I’m a CS student who spends too much time tweaking my Arch setup(check my dots).
I’m into computers, tech, games, anime and books. Right now I’m learning backend dev with FastAPI.
I made this site to share what I learn on my journey.
title: About

content: url-shortener (WIP) - a url-shortener made with FastAPI & PostgreSQL dotfiles - config files for my Arch setup super-screen-saver - a terminal screensaver script inspired by omarchy’s screensaver Rip-YT - a simple gui for yt-dlp in Python Tascy - a simple CLI to-do list made with Python & SQLite Qwik - a simple Python script to generate customizable QR codes
title: Projects
